name: Mirrored Fate (tetracup)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move, 

E to Switch Character,

Space to Kick ( Only if you are Ea)

This game is about the same character in two different realities, Ae lives in a paradise and is fast and Ea lives in a hellish reality crawling with enemies. They end up in each other realms, which happen to be mirrored realities of each other. You must collect mirror energy to break their cross-reality bond and allow them to return back to their realms. 

The arrow above the character indicts who you are controlling, if you are Ae you can go double as fast as Ea, however if you are Ea you have a powerful kick which can be used using Space. Collect as much mirror energy as you can and get to the end!
